name: Fungal Invasion
description:
This project is part of the GameDev.tv 2022 Game Jam:

https://itch.io/jam/gamedevtv-jam-2022

Theme: Death is Only the Beginning!

The is my first ever game jam that I've been apart of.

I really enjoyed developing this project and although I didn't have enough time to implement all my ideas, I've learned a lot of new things from the stuff that I did create, such as a procedurally generated tilemap system.

Backstory

Fight off the Fungal Invasion! Play in a topdown world as a mech and survive against hoards of fungal matter.

Cool Development Features
  • Procedurally generated tilemap
  • Event system implemented through ScriptableObjects

Features I'd like to implement
  • I'd like to expand upon my procedural tilemap system. Currently it's set to a fixed dimension of 100x100
